name: places/ChIJVYhu1_9ZwokR1gMV98d4aQs
adrFormatAddress: 580 5th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: I absolutely love my ring from Stefano Navi. We got my dream ring for such a great price. Their customer service is very helpful and responsive.

text.text: I absolutely love my ring from Stefano Navi. We got my dream ring for such a great price. Their customer service is very helpful and responsive.

originalText.text:
I searched for hours on the Internet to find a Jewelry store that sells just one diamond earring, as I only have one ear pierced.  I finally found Stefano Navi and I am so glad that I did.  They have the best prices that I could find on the Internet and I could buy just one earring.

I decided on a modest 0.25 carat diamond.  I wanted it in a 14k martini setting, but they did not have it in a martini setting, so they offered to put it in a martini setting for me at no additional charge.  It took a little while for them to reset the diamond for me, but it was well worth the wait.  The diamond is colorless (F), and the clarity is superb, with minimal inclusions (VS).  Needless to say, I am thrilled with my new earring and would definitely buy from them again.

originalText.text:
Great price, product and customer service.

Ordered a pair of diamond studs for my daughter. Within a few weeks, one of the screwbacks undid itself and was lost. I contacted customer service and they mailed me a replacement.
Fast forward a few weeks, the other back undid itself but this time the whole earring was lost.

I contacted Stefano Navi and spoke with the manager/owner I believe. He was understanding and accommodated me with obtaining a replacement, this time with pushbacks as the screwbacks just were not working for us.

The 2nd set is earrings is just as beautiful as the first. Thank you Stefano Navi for having top notch customer service and assisting me!

originalText.text: Sheina and the rest of the staff at Stefano Navi were phenomenal throughout the process! They were able to provide a flawless ring at and exceptional price point! Highly recommend working with then!

text.text: Sheina and the rest of the staff at Stefano Navi were phenomenal throughout the process! They were able to provide a flawless ring at and exceptional price point! Highly recommend working with then!

originalText.text: Absolutely beautiful stone bezel set on a fine chain...so simple and yet elegant.  Am over the moon about this necklace and the experience with Sheina.  Quality, price and service were all there.  Great job!  Will return... and highly recommend.
